name: Create Airtable records from new websites in Atarim
description:
This template periodically checks for new websites in Atarim and uses the retrieved information to create new records in Airtable.

Your Airtable table should have at least these columns:
1) ID as single line text
2) Site name as single line text
3) Site URL as URL
4) Date as date

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
